name: victoria Coordination Tasks
description: Active coordination tasks managed by victoria

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Need security requirements review and backend validation rules for implementing frontend security components. Please provide:
1. Required validation rules for user input
2. Token structure and requirements
3. Session timeout specifications
4. Access control matrix for user roles
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Implementing frontend validation and security UI components for SSELFIE Studio platform. Need to ensure alignment between frontend UX and backend security requirements.
